snippet.title: Mr. Saitou - Ancient Minimori Meeting Ground (Laura Shigihara) ♫
snippet.description:
🍰Don't forget to Wishlist & Follow Mr. Saitou on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/628740/Mr_Saitou/
💙Mr. Saitou will also be bundled with Rakuen on Nintendo Switch!
https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/rakuen-switch/

✨Return to the world of Rakuen, where a new adventure awaits!✨
Mr. Saitou is a short game (3-4 hours long) about an average white-collar worker who struggles to find meaning in a life full of constant overtime and social isolation. After an accident lands him in the hospital, Mr. Saitou is spirited away to a strange fantasy world where an unexpected friend takes him on a life-changing adventure.

🌿Rakuen Official Website: https://www.rakuen.io
🌸Rakuen on Steam: https://bit.ly/2tVyRa3

Twitter: https://twitter.com/supershigi
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/supershigi
Merch: https://store.laurashigihara.com/
♫ Spotify: https://spoti.fi/2DOlESm​​
♫ Apple: https://apple.co/36MPrXi
​​Website: https://www.laurashigihara.com/
​Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LauraShigihara

#rakuen #pixelart #indiegame #gaming #cozygames #rpg #storygames #videogamemusic
